name: Flick Ebooks
description: A beautiful ebook reader with multiple themes, font options, and reading progress tracking.
long_description:
Flick Ebooks is an elegant ebook reader designed for the Flick mobile shell. Features include:

- Support for plain text files
- Three reading themes: Dark, Sepia, and Light
- Serif/Sans-serif font toggle
- Adjustable font sizes
- Automatic pagination
- Reading position saved per book
- Progress percentage display
- Estimated reading time
- Immersive reading mode
- Page turn animations
- Horizontal swipe navigation
- Beautiful book covers with progress indicators
